channel.title: Comments on: Experiencing an ODE per day
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Dad
item.dc:creator: Dad
item.description: ANother one. Examine a roll of thick tape or other material. Start to unroll it and determine how much is remaining in the roll of a fixed total amount as you pull it out cm at a time.
item.content:encoded: ANother one. Examine a roll of thick tape or other material. Start to unroll it and determine how much is remaining in the roll of a fixed total amount as you pull it out cm at a time.

item.title: By: Dad
item.dc:creator: Dad
item.description: Fun differential example. Truck driver with horizontal cylindarical gas tank. Gas gage is broken. All he has is a stick to dip into the tank to measure the tank and imply volume/miles of fuel remaining. I think this one might have been a puzzler on "click and clack".
item.content:encoded: Fun differential example. Truck driver with horizontal cylindarical gas tank. Gas gage is broken. All he has is a stick to dip into the tank to measure the tank and imply volume/miles of fuel remaining. I think this one might have been a puzzler on “click and clack”.
